definition: land west of the Yellow river/Shaanxi, Qinghai and Gansu provinces
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
west
Hexi district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]
Hexi Corridor (or Gansu Corridor), a string of oases running the length of Gansu, forming part of the Northern Silk Road
Hexipu town in Yongchang county 永昌縣|永昌县[Yong3 chang1 xian4], Jinchang 金昌[Jin1 chang1], Gansu
the river flows thirty years to the East, thirty years to the West (proverb)/change is the only constant
pinyin: san1 shi2 nian2 he2 dong1 , san1 shi2 nian2 he2 xi1
containing_words.word: 三十年河東，三十年河西

definition: Hexipu town in Yongchang county 永昌縣|永昌县[Yong3 chang1 xian4], Jinchang 金昌[Jin1 chang1], Gansu

sentences.english: Hexi corridor was named one of the commodity grain base in China and granary bam of Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 河西走廊被譽爲甘肅的糧倉和全國的商品糧基地之一。

sentences.english: Yongdeng County, which has a long history, is the gateway of the Hexi Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 永登縣歷史悠久，是通往河西走廊的門戶。

sentences.english: The same is true in the West Bank and the Islamic world.
sentences.chinese: 約旦河西岸地區乃至整個伊斯蘭世界也是如此。

sentences.english: Chinese officials are also aware that the U. S. will never get its fiscal house in order.
sentences.chinese: 河西在涉外和財院有兩家，其他地方就不知道了。

sentences.english: Wang Han was a poet of Hexi, Qiang Minority in Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 王翰，元代河西詩人，党項羌族。

sentences.english: Fayyad wants most of the money funneled through his West Bank-based government.
sentences.chinese: 法耶玆希望多數的資金能通過約旦河西岸政府流入。

sentences.english: An ultra-Orthodox Jewish boy prayed in Nabi Samuel, West Bank, Wednesday, during celebrations for the prophet Samuel.
sentences.chinese: 一名極端正統猶太教男孩在進行禱告，約旦河西岸。

sentences.english: I lived in the West Bank.
From the west bank one can walk to the Orange Islet during the winter dry season.
sentences.chinese: 冬天枯水季節可以從河西走到橘子洲頭。

sentences.english: The content of salt and alkali in soil in Hexi region was high.
sentences.chinese: 河西地區土壤鹽鹼含量高，一般草坪草種不易成坪。

sentences.english: The Wusun first lived in the Gansu Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 烏孫，最初活動於河西走廊。

sentences.english: The top view, Taylor's plain, Wen River flow, take in everything in a glance.
sentences.chinese: 山頂遠望，泰萊平原，汶河西流，一覽無餘。

sentences.english: Huangyang town is small town in Hexi aisle of Gansu Province.
sentences.chinese: 黃羊鎮是甘肅省河西走廊的一個小鎮。

sentences.english: Halophytes in Hexi area of Gansu has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 對甘肅河西地區鹽生植物區系進行了研究。

sentences.english: Jiayuguan sits along one of the narrowest parts of the Hexi Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 嘉峪關所在的地方，是河西走廊最狹窄的區域之一。

definition: Hedong district of Linyi city 臨沂市|临沂市[Lin2 yi2 shi4], Shandong
